title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: Long before now, many of us must have engaged in different failed financial projects like investment companies, ponzi scheme, gambling, betting and loto. Most of things give people hard experience to trust any system. People fails in wonder banks, in digital gold and crude oil, when bitcoin first came in 2009 nobody believe the project probably because of failed financial portfolio they've experience and witnessed but now out of 100% of people, only few percent do not trust the system still. Why do we have this so much trust on bitcoin that it not die easily? That bitcoin is a long term investment with confidentiality. Why do you chose to trust bitcoin over any other investment?

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on April 12, 2023, 03:58:19 PMWhy do we have this so much trust on bitcoin that it not die easily? That bitcoin is a long term investment with confidentiality. Why do you chose to trust bitcoin over any other investment?Bitcoin has a progressive reputation that built through the years. I’m a doubter too on Bitcoin the first time I saw it due to its high volatility that is much worst than current condition due to limited liquidity.Bitcoin liquidity is now huge since many people already trusting. This is the result of converting non-believers to believer every time Bitcoin defeat the bear market multiple times for every 4 year cycle.More than a decade of continuous price growth and unwavering decentralized feature of Bitcoin gave high confidence to all holders to trust more Bitcoin as time passes by.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Firstly it's not quite right on this board because you don't discuss about help or beginners so it's better to move it to the bitcoin discussion board.It's quite simple why we chose bitcoin as a long-term asset because it has a limited total supply, a value that continues to increase due to increasing demand and supply and many more where the reason for choosing bitcoin is of course financial freedom that we can control ourselves without anyone control anything.Now bitcoin is becoming a more important asset in the modern era, being able to beat other assets, of course we have to be aware of its fast growth and high risk, but with volatility there are still many who believe in bitcoin.

Why do you chose to trust bitcoin over any other investment?I have always avoided any investment that promises instant or huge profit. Bitcoin unlike other crypto investments suits my belief that any business that promises instant money doubling is a scam. Bitcoin promotes the virtues of patience and bravery. Bitcoin has also been consistent for a long time. Many cryptocurrencies have been created and within a few years they disappeared from the crypto space. But bitcoin has remained in existence since it was created. Everybody wants to be associated with the number one or the champion of any industry. Bitcoin has remained the number one cryptocurrency and I want to be part of the winning team. I am also attracted to bitcoin because even in the face of attacks and unfriendliness by different governments and financial institutions, the coin is still growing stronger every day. The selfless and humble nature of the creator of the coin is proof that it was created to for selfish reasons but to give the world privacy and freedom.

comments.body: This forum continues to give me alot of reasons to trust Bitcoin and aside from this, I have gained alot to know Scam project and this is among the things I'm greatful for this forum.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on April 12, 2023, 03:58:19 PMWhy do we have this so much trust on bitcoin that it not die easily? That bitcoin is a long term investment with confidentiality. Why do you chose to trust bitcoin over any other investment?The world now is now driven by technology, and everything is becoming digital.We make physical investments and profit from them, but we also fail due to a lack of trust, which is mostly influenced by third parties.Some of us get involved in Ponzi schemes due to a lack of proper knowledge, whereas gambling is done for fun, even though some people become addicted to it.The entire Bitcoin process is transparent enough for everyone, and Bitcoin provides us with financial freedom in that we can now conduct our transactions without the involvement of a third party, and there is nothing unclear about the entire Bitcoin process. Given how far Bitcoin has come and the rate of adoption that is increasing on a daily basis, it is clear that there is a future in Bitcoin that no one will want to miss out on.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: The answer is simple. I chose it because it promoted values that I care about like privacy, having full control over your money, not being oppressed by the government who can threaten to freeze your accounts. I bought it because I felt it could be worth much more and I wasn't really into making a lot of money but I didn't want to lose it. Since I made money on this investment, I appreciate and value bitcoin. Bitcoin is a part of who I am financially and politically. IMO 10 years from now politicians will use it like a trading card. There are many such slogans that people are always for or against like abortion, or capital punishment and bitcoin is becoming one of them. You'll say you're against bitcoin you'll lose a lot of votes.

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: When you ask me why do I trust it, I'll ask you why shouldn't I? When you're investing your time and money into something and that thing keeps giving back every time, you get used to it and attached. You treat it like something familiar to you, a part of your life. At this time, if bitcoin went to a million dollars I still wouldn't get rid of it. I know I'm going to be a holder as long as bitcoin exists. It gives so much benefits and security that even if I spend some of it, it's never going to be all of it.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: As a newbie I could not be convinced into buying shitcoins because I was fortunate to have the right information early in my crypto journey. Even though I bought my first Satoshi two years ago, I believe bitcoin is still in early stage and has a long way to go before it can become mainstream as a truly viable alternative for traditional currencies, bitcoin has not reached its full potential and until then the price will keep going up. That’s why I hodl.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: JamesBorn on April 12, 2023, 03:58:19 PMWhy do we have this so much trust on bitcoin that it not die easily? That bitcoin is a long term investment with confidentiality. Why do you chose to trust bitcoin over any other investment?because its value has gone beyond its early days price, when it was not even worth a cent. Satoshi created Bitcoin as an open source for everyone to take control of their funds in a digitalized approach instead of leaving our funds in the hands of financial elites, and today the Bitcoin price has skyrocketed and demand is so high compared to 2010 and 2021. Bitcoin still has a lot of years of halving left. Bitcoin still has more ATHs to come. All these reasons are why I chose Bitcoin, and I also fell in love with Satoshi's idea of being in total control of my funds, which is why I chose and will still choose Bitcoin over every other crypto. Investing in other assets without investing into Bitcoin is a risk for me.OP, people invest into Bitcoin, I mean a lot of people! but majority of these people still have others investment.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: First and foremost, bitcoin is not a ponzi scheme. It was created with the good intention of serving as an asset and, in some cases, legal tender. Additionally, it was the first cryptocurrency in existence and has earned a great deal of trust. As you mentioned, bitcoin had nothing to do with finance in 2009, but as time has passed, it has gained more traction than other cryptocurrencies. I trust bitcoin more than other cryptocurrencies because of the widespread awareness it has received, even in this forum. i trust bitcoin compare to altcoins which might not really survive in bear market like what happened  to FTX.
